channel.title: Ascii Art
channel.description:
Ascii Art is Art made up of symbols and characters such as /.,;'[]\()_=¯mndggocbhghajiojjf etc.
i am going to draw an example and then you can start drawing your own! Enjoy! :)
, . , . - , - . , . ° ° . , ° , - ° - , ° , . °. ,
a pizza! made of degree symbols and commas and -'s and dots! ill also write the alt codes for you to make better symbols for better pictures :)
but the easier way is... ok go to all programs>accessories>System Tools>Character Map! now click on one and it should appear on the box below! now you can copy and paste it or you can go to Microsoft works word proccessor and pick symbols too!
oh and(i didnt know if there was anywhere else to put this so i put it here)
Have fun making ugly ascii art then when you get better it'll be so nice lol :cool:see my pepperonis by the way? just use the change color option

item.title: Ascii Art
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

Mr.Chris:

nator, how the fuck is that ice-cream lol…

Fine, if you check real closely it’s 2 fat ass people peeing with their dicks out on a small puddle. The -'s are the dicks, _ is puddle. Little clue xD

8====[) ()

Is that ascii arty enough?

Read full topic

item.title: Ascii Art
item.dc:creator: @3.65_kilos 3.65 kilos
item.description:
@3.65_kilos wrote:

[code]

                                                                        /\/\/\/\
                                                                   /\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/x
                                                               /\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\xx
                                                           /\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\oo/\/xx
                                                        /\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/oooo\/\/xx
                                                     /\/\ooo/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/ooooo/\/\/xxx
                                                  /\/\/\oooo/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\ooo/\/\/\/\/\/xxx
                                              /\/\/\/\/\oooo/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\xxxx
                                        /\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\xxxxxx
                                     /\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\xxxxxxxxx
                                        /\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/xxxxxxxxxxx
                                                                      ooooox
                                                                      ooooox
                                                                      oooooxx
                                                                        oooooxx
                                                                        ooooooxx
                                                                          ooooooox
                                                                           ooooooxxx
                                                                          oooooooxxx
                                                                         ooooooooxxx
                                                                          oooooooxxx
                                                                            ooooxxxx
                                                                  [/code]

Oh wow. It really is fun! [/sarcasm]

Yeah. Animations are better. I think there was a topic earlier this week about animations…or maybe it was a post…

EDIT: My mushroom messed up…
